name: Clouds Walk With Me
description:
Clouds Walk With Me is a little experiment made for Castle Game Jam 2018.

This is a response to constant feeling stress and pressure.
It is an invitation to take things slowly, enjoy the view and the moment.

Allow yourself to be there.
Even if for a short while.

Not constantly chasing meaning.
Not worrying about pursuing a goal.

Maybe this is what's missing.

--
